msg: Fixed bug where properties using the ${} syntax weren't being expanded, reported by Mridul Pathak - https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-2066.

author: ate
msg: Fix for PLUTO-517: PortletWindowConfig#createPortletId generates troublesome id with leading slash
This minor (portal driver only) change is needed for WicketPortlet Portlet API 2.0 support (see WICKET-1620)
